FuncDef: The reset vlan-statistics command clears user traffic statistics based on a specified inner or outer VLAN ID on a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about user packets with a specified inner or outer VLAN ID from a specified interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Clears statistics about user packets with a specified inner VLAN ID from a specified interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When you run the display vlan-statistics pevlan command to check user traffic statistics based on a specified inner or outer VLAN ID on a device, a large number of historical statistics may be displayed, which makes data analysis difficult. To resolve this problem, run the reset vlan-statistics pevlan command to clear the existing statistics before running the display vlan-statistics pevlan command to view the newly collected statistics.
Precautions
Statistics cannot be restored after you clear them. Therefore, exercise caution when running the reset vlan statistics command.
